channel.title: maids on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in maids on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Seventh month
item.description: (17th July-16th August) Being uncertain about travel plans ahead we got his passport ready in hurry-burry where my darling posed in front of camera without much hesitation. He can balance to sit unsupported but for short time while leaning forward and spreading his legs out wide and straight for support. He started to recognize people. On calling his name from back he use to turn around to find where sounds come from.
